resources.string:
•Having 10 years’s experience of software development 
 •Specializing in software design and development particularly Java/JEE Technology. 
 •Track record for hands on and team lead role for selective off shoring and on shoring activities. 
 •Able to work in a team or independently. 
 •Passion for knowledge exchange through discussion, teaching, and writing.
Spring planning and Gooooooo :) take and finish it :D \n

*To liaise with customer with regards project documentation change request and delivery support
 *Conduct User Acceptance Test 
 *To solve any issue being raised through ticketing system (L3 support) 
 *Develop system using TCL (DSD) and integrate with SGSN, CRM (EAI) , IN OCS and F5. 
 *Social Media Project for AXIS Telekom Indonesia (STC group) Implement different QOS and rate charging for different URL accessed by subscriber 
 *On site and remote deployment.
Technical Leader, Reliable Business Technologies, Sdn. Bhd. June 2010-July 2012

Involve in meter management project as technical leader. Meter management is a billing system for local call in telecom Malaysia (TM). My contributions are; 
 *Ceate FRS and SDD documents, 
 *Design the system. The technologies involved are using Hibernate, Spring MVC, JBoss-drools (Rule engine) , Infinispan cache, LDAP, Crystal Report and Ext-JS 
 *Manage UAT session up to sign off by client (presenting the system to client in , managing to create user manual, SOP documents etc) 
 *Deployment into production using HP-UX server (Deployment management) 
 *Manage change request from client. 
 *Develop and involved in HRP (High Risk Profiling) system. Decision Support System to detect smuggling activity. Uses Hibernate, JBoss-drools (Rule engine), Ext-JS, Spring MVC, Spring Security). My contributions are creating FRS and SDS for the project and develop the application. 
 *Portal for finance institution reporting to Central Bank. Uses Liferay and XBRL.
Lead engineer, Converging Network Solution. June 2009–June 2010

*Manage project Client-Server where j2ee as server and mobile app acting as the client.
 *Mobile advertising; Push advertising to registered android device. JSON format data exchange. 
 Server side: Using JBoss Seam framework, plain java socket and REST base web service. Client side: Android platform 
 *Push mail android: Push mail to registered android device. JSON format data exchange. 
 Server side: Using JBoss Seam framework, plain java socket and REST base web service. 
 Client side: Android platform
Software Developer, Lufthansa Systems Indonesia. October 2006–June 2009

*Develop loyalty program (Frequent Flyer Program) using webwork 
 *hibernate 3, pico nano container, velocity, iReport. It is deployed on JBoss Application Server (production) 
 *Develop reservation systems for low cost carrier using spring , jsf, hibernate 3, iReport, quartz scheduler, and JMS ActiveMQ

*Developing a web based Customer Information File (CIF) Application for Trimegah Securities using struts, iReport, jsp and hibernate. 
 *Developing j2ee application for online trading using spring framework, Fix protocol with jms (SonicMQ) and java socket. It's deployed in JBoss application server.
Designer and Developer, Vision03 (PT. Visi Gagas Komunika)
Researcher and Youth Indonesian DelegationBorobudur Ship Ekspedition
